mapper.sql: r.id as r_id, r.created_by as r_created_by, r.created_date as r_created_date, r.last_modified_by as r_last_modified_by, r.last_modified_date as r_last_modified_date, r.parent_id as r_parent_id, r.lft as r_lft, r.rt as r_rt, r.level as r_level, r.type as r_type, r.name as r_name, r.permission as r_permission, r.path_exp as r_path_exp, r.method as r_method, r.icon as r_icon, r.status as r_status
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sys_resource r
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_resource (created_by, created_date, last_modified_by, last_modified_date, parent_id, lft, rt, level, type, name, permission, path_exp, method, icon, status) values (#{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastModifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lft,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{rt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pathExp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update sys_resource r
r.id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
r.created_by = #{record.createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
r.created_date = #{record.createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
r.last_modified_by = #{record.lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
r.last_modified_date = #{record.lastModifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
r.parent_id = #{record.parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
r.lft = #{record.lft,jdbcType=BIGINT},
r.rt = #{record.rt,jdbcType=BIGINT},
r.level = #{record.level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
r.type = #{record.type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
r.name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r.permission = #{record.permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r.path_exp = #{record.pathExp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r.method = #{record.method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r.icon = #{record.icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r.status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update sys_resource r set r.id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, r.created_by = #{record.createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, r.created_date = #{record.createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, r.last_modified_by = #{record.lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, r.last_modified_date = #{record.lastModifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, r.parent_id = #{record.parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, r.lft = #{record.lft,jdbcType=BIGINT}, r.rt = #{record.rt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, r.level = #{record.level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, r.type = #{record.type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, r.name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r.permission = #{record.permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r.path_exp = #{record.pathExp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r.method = #{record.method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r.icon = #{record.icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r.status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_resource
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_modified_by = #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
last_modified_date = #{lastModifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
lft = #{lft,jdbcType=BIGINT},
rt = #{rt,jdbcType=BIGINT},
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
permission = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
path_exp = #{pathExp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_resource set created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modified_by = #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, last_modified_date = #{lastModifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, lft = #{lft,jdbcType=BIGINT}, rt = #{rt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, path_exp = #{pathExp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_resource r LEFT JOIN sys_group_resource gr ON gr.resource_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_group_user gu ON gu.group_id = gr.group_id WHERE gu.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND r.status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY r.lft
SELECT permission FROM sys_resource WHERE permission IS NOT NULL AND permission != ''

SELECT r.permission FROM sys_resource r LEFT JOIN sys_group_resource gr ON gr.resource_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_group_user gu ON gu.group_id = gr.group_id WHERE gu.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND r.status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND r.permission IS NOT NULL AND r.permission != ''
